verbs.description: illustrate (third-person singular simple present illustrates, present participle illustrating, simple past and past participle illustrated)

entries.meaning: (figurative) To clarify something by giving, or serving as, an example or a comparison.
examples: We illustrate our definitions by including quotations or simple examples.

entries.meaning: To provide a book or other publication with pictures, diagrams or other explanatory or decorative features.
examples: The economics textbook was illustrated with many graphs.

entries.meaning: (obsolete) To give renown or honour to; to make illustrious.
